transform_def.name: elliptic_DiscSquareMapping
transform_def.string: let a = p_in.x b = p_in.y u = a * sqrt(1.0 - b * b * 0.5) v = b * sqrt(1.0 - a * a * 0.5) x = 0.5 * sqrt(2.0 + a * a - b * b + 2.0 * sqrt2() * a) - 0.5 * sqrt(2.0 + a * a - b * b - 2.0 * sqrt2() * a) y = 0.5 * sqrt(2.0 - a * a + b * b + 2.0 * sqrt2() * b) - 0.5 * sqrt(2.0 - a * a + b * b - 2.0 * sqrt2() * b) in (if switch == 0 then vec2(u, v) else vec2(x, y)) * weight
